org.sql: SELECT 1 AS one FROM users WHERE LOWER(users.login) LIKE LOWER('%smi%') OR users.id IN (SELECT user_id FROM email_addresses WHERE LOWER(address) LIKE LOWER('%smi%')) OR LOWER(users.firstname) LIKE LOWER('%smi%') OR LOWER(users.lastname) LIKE LOWER('%smi%') LIMIT "$1"

rewrites.sql: SELECT 1 AS one FROM users WHERE LOWER(users.login) LIKE LOWER('%smi%') OR users.id IN (SELECT user_id FROM email_addresses WHERE LOWER(address) LIKE LOWER('%smi%') LIMIT 1) OR LOWER(users.firstname) LIKE LOWER('%smi%') OR LOWER(users.lastname) LIKE LOWER('%smi%') LIMIT "$1"
